content:
Configure the Objects Displayed in a Customer Story

To add a customer story to a new page layout, create new object configurations for the Opportunity object. 

Navigate to Setup > Custom Settings and click Story Object Configuration.
Select Manage.
Select New.
Fill out the Story Object form:
Name: Opportunity_Event
Detail Fields: Description
Parent Object Name: Opportunity
Has Owner: checked
Story Object Lookup Field: WhatId
Story Object Name: Event
Story Object Sort Field: StartDateTime
Summary Fields: Title:Subject,Title_Highlight:Type,Subtitle:Location

Click Save.
Click Back to List.
Repeat for Opportunity_Note and Opportunity_Task using the following values:
Name: Opportunity_Note
Detail Fields: Body
Parent Object Name: Opportunity
Has Owner: checked
Story Object Lookup Field: ParentId
Story Object Name: Note
Story Object Sort Field: LastModifiedDate
Summary Fields: Title:Title

Name: Opportunity_Task
Detail Fields: Description
Parent Object Name: Opportunity
Has Owner: checked
Story Object Lookup Field: WhatId
Story Object Name: Task
Story Object Sort Field: ActivityDate
Summary Fields: Title:Subject,Title_Highlight:Status,Subtitle:Priority,Type:Type

Customer Story Configuration
The following tables describe the settings you can configure for customer story objects:
Import Customer Story Configuration Settings
You can import standard customer story configuration settings from Static Resources in your org.
Before updating a Customer Story Object Configuration for a new Customer Story, import the standard Customer Story Object Configuration.
title: Configure OmniStudio Customer Story Objects
